hero.title: 5G Network Operations Efficiency Powered by Artificial Intelligence
hero.description: Public and private sector stakeholders around the world seek ways to ensure that wireless communications provide the level of reliability and resilience we have long taken for granted from the wireline network. Unfortunately, despite the societal and economic impact of wireless connectivity disruptions, we lack real-time scalable tools and validated methodologies to identify and understand large-scale wireless network outages.

problem.title: The Problem?
problem.intro: Wireless networks experience the challenge of a real challenge in Wireless Operations

kpi.title: KPI
kpi.desc1: No visibility on the KPI degradation for a real-time manner.
kpi.desc2: No sense of urgency to solve the troubles efficiently.

reactive.title: Reactive
reactive.desc1: Faults detected only when they fully surface and customers are impacted.
reactive.desc2: There is a lack of real-time, scalable, and validated tools to identify and understand wireless network outages.

manual.title: Manual
manual.desc1: Thousands of tickets, alarms, and built-in email alerts everyday with only less than 3% leading to true customer impacting incidents.
manual.desc2: 97% are simply noise that can and should be ignored.

solution.title: Our Solution
solution.desc1: We have developed a software solution to early detect and solve all wireless network Outages.
solution.desc2: We monitor key KPIs in real time by leveraging MNO data: RAN, Core and Transport IP.
solution.desc3: We apply Machine Learning (ML) and Artificial Intelligence (AI) methodologies, to identify/predict the root causes and automate the resolution actions.
